post: The Bill of Rights Institute is honored to introduce the James Madison Legacy Society, a new gift planning opportunity. Planned giving is a meaningful way to leave a legacy that will support our young people  and shape the future of civic education  for generations to come. BRI's Director of Strategic Partnerships, Jennifer Seal, explains more about the James Madison Legacy Society and her personal commitment to the effort. To learn more, please watch the video below or visit  https://lnkd.in/e9qDssKY. For more information, visit supportbri.org.  #billofrightsinstitute  #plannedgiving  #jamesmadisonlegacysociety

We would like to thank Your Bindery for its generous donation and support for the Bill of Rights Institutes The Power of the Printed Word campaign. The Power of the Printed Word campaign is BRIs effort to provide pocket copies of the U. S. Constitution to teachers and students nationwide. Supporters like Luann Wood @YBF help make these important initiatives possible. To learn more about our resources and programsand to see how to support the Bill of Rights Institutevisit www.mybri.org.  #billofrightsinstitute  #BRI  #PowerofthePrintedWord

Today, June 6, 2024, marks the 80th anniversary of the D-Day landings along the Normandy coast during World War II. You are about to embark upon a great crusade, toward which we have striven these many months. The eyes of the world are upon you. . . . I have full confidence in your devotion to duty and skill in battle. We will accept nothing less than full Victory," Dwight D. Eisenhower dispatched to the troops before they landed. To commemorate this historic day, check out our playlist of D-Day resources, here  https://lnkd.in/emn8WG8B Or watch our Heroes & Villains video, here  https://lnkd.in/eK-jwBWx  #billofrightsinstitute  #BRI  #DDay

Students across the state of Ohio will now have their own copies of Americas founding documents, thanks to the generosity of two businesses in the state. Cleveland-based Foote Printing Inc. and BINDTECH, which operates a plant in Macedonia, OH, have donated more than 13,500 pocket-sized constitutions for use in Ohio classrooms. The companies donated paper, printing, binding, and finishing services as part of the Bill of Rights Institutes The Power of the Printed Word campaign. "I believe a good understanding of the United States Constitution is paramount for creating the civic-minded leaders the USA needs now and in the future,  said Foote Printing co-owner Michael Duhr. To read more, visit  https://lnkd.in/eJnFpQYU  #billofrightsinstitute  #BRI  #poweroftheprintedword

At the Bill of Rights Institute, we teach civicsand we are proud to equip students and teachers to live the ideals of a free and just society. In this video, Anthony Simone, Vice President of Development at the Bill of Rights Institute, discusses the importance of supporting BRI's work. You can watch the full video below:  https://lnkd.in/egGH5Y_2 If you'd like to donate, please visit  https://lnkd.in/ePsJtSJy  #billofrightsinstitute  #BRI  #civiceducation

Huddle Up, a leading advocate for childrens growth, development, and mental health, is sponsoring our MyImpact Challenge Contest! As we celebrate Mental Health Month, we celebrate the organizations' shared commitment to support young people's well-being.  https://bit.ly/BRIMIC

May is National Military Appreciation Month  and New Mexico teacher Juan Armijo reminds us that our military members and veterans can be wonderful classroom resources. Armijo, a member of the Bill of Rights Institute National Teacher Council, shares how a World War II veteran helped his students gain a greater understanding of civics, history, and service. To read Armijos story, just click below.  https://lnkd.in/ey3h-ja5  #billofrightsinstitute  #BRI  #MillitaryAppreciationMonth

Do you know a student who should participate in MyImpact Challenge? MyImpact Challenge Deadline: Sunday, May 19! Heres what you need to submit a project: - a current or active civics or service-based project - an essay of up to 1,200 words describing how your project exudes one of BRIs Civic Virtues or Founding Principles SUBMIT NOW:  https://lnkd.in/gagj58zD  #billofrightsinstitute  #BRI  #myimpactchallenge

Deeply grateful to Michael Duhr (Foote Printing) and John Helline (BINDTECH) for their generosity and support of students in the great state of Ohio. Because of their support, thousands of students will now have printed pocket constitutions. If you would like to help support your own state or city for the Power of the Printed Word Initiative, please message me on LinkedIn :) Let's show the entire country how amazing the graphic arts community is!  #Printing  #Binding  #Civics  #Constiution  #GraphicArts  #Liberty
